item.description:
All Sierra Club members, friends, and colleagues are welcome!

This will be a great opportunity to meet some of the Chapter leaders and activists. We'll supply snacks and beverages. Plus we will have lots of literature about the projects we will be working on and ways you can get more involved. The Sierra Club office is fully accessible, located near the MBTA's Park, Downtown Crossing, and State Street stations.

Come anytime between 4 and 6pm. Free.

More info: 617-423-5775 or office@sierraclubmass.org

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Mass Sierra Club Holiday Party
